DOC.brief_summary: Prevalence Diabetic Retinopathy São José Rio Preto-SP-Brazil Abstract Objective : To determine prevalence characteristic diabetic retinopathy ( DR ) among patient São José Rio Preto-SP-Brazil . Local : Departamento de Retina e Vítreo Hospital Olho de Rio Preto ( HORP ) Methods : Design : population-based cross-sectional study . The study sample , 710 patient derive HIPERDIA ( Diabetes High-blood pressure social health care program ) São José Rio Preto . All patient , know diabetes , underwent eye examination biomicroscope indirect ophthalmoscope check sign DR dilate pupil . Participants also interview examined determine demographic characteristic , medical condition realization previous fundoscopic eye examination . Statistical study do -Student test , Fisher test chi-square test .
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence Diabetic Retinopathy São José Rio Preto-SP-Brazil
DOC.detailed_description: Prevalence Diabetic Retinopathy São José Rio Preto-SP-Brazil Abstract Objective : To determine prevalence characteristic diabetic retinopathy ( DR ) among patient São José Rio Preto-SP-Brazil . Local : Departamento de Retina e Vítreo Hospital Olho de Rio Preto ( HORP ) Methods : Design : population-based cross-sectional study . The study sample , 710 patient derive HIPERDIA ( Diabetes High-blood pressure social health care program ) São José Rio Preto . All patient , know diabetes , underwent eye examination biomicroscope indirect ophthalmoscope check sign DR dilate pupil . Participants also interview examined determine demographic characteristic , medical condition realization previous fundoscopic eye examination . Statistical study do -Student test , Fisher test chi-square test . Results : Among 710 screen patient 112 degree diabetic retinopathy overall standardized prevalence retinopathy 16,3 % . , include 90 ( 80,4 % ) non-proliferative ( 22 ) 19,6 % proliferative diabetic retinopathy . Only 143 patient ( 68,7 % ) history previous fundoscopic eye examination . Conclusion : This study demonstrate DM complication important public health problem . The duration DM glicemic control strongly associate DR . Prevention program periodic fundoscopic exam show diminish prevalence ocular disease . Keywords : Diabetes , Retinopathy , Prevalence , Population .
DOC.criteria: Patients Diabetes Melittus Patients without Diabetes Melittus
